description:
At Taliaferro, Carran, Cowherd & Hampton, PLLC, our attorneys provide experienced legal advice to individuals in Covington, Kentucky, and the surrounding areas. We handle personal injury matters as well as business and estate planning matters.

Solving Problems Efficiently And Effectively

Serious personal injury matters deserve serious attention. At Taliaferro, Carran, Cowherd & Hampton, PLLC, we understand that a serious injury can have life-changing effects. Our lawyers will work tirelessly to help you recover physically and financially, no matter how you were injured:

  • Motor vehicle accidents, including car, truck, motorcycle and pedestrian accidents
  • Premises liability
  • Construction accidents

We know that no two personal injury matters are the same. You have your own needs, and we will tailor our approach to them. We will be aggressive advocates for your rights and your best interests throughout the duration of your case.

Work With Respected Attorneys

Our attorneys have decades of combined experience. In that time, they have proven themselves to be skilled litigators and aggressive advocates, and have received recognition for their talents and willingness to fight for what is best for their clients.

Arrange Your Free Consultation Today

If you were injured in an accident or need assistance with another type of legal matter, learn more about how we can help in a free consultation. To schedule an appointment, call 859-757-4926 or toll free at 866-959-1943.
